summary: A thought-provoking drama about the power that a famous university professor holds over his students and assistants.
cast: Rutger Hauer|Matthew Davis|Dagmara Dominczyk|Susan Misner|Matt Servitto|Peter Scolari|Lynn Chen|Isabel Glasser|Lawrence Pressman|Ronald Guttman|Mike Carlsen|Dennis T. Carnegie|Dave Cooperman|Darrel Cox|Irene Glezos|Tracy Griswold|Maximiliano Hernández|Nicole Catrice Keller|Connie Lamothe|Chris Layman|Robert LuPone|Marty McDonough|James P. Morrow|Adam Nee|Trisha Reed|Thomas W. Stewart|Ronald Trostle|Zach Wegner|Jamie Wozny|Carrie Yaeger|Clary Davison
title: Mentor
